reviewText: Loved this movie!  Bruce Greenwood and Emma Samms were great together.  I could have done without the Simone/Brent shower scene but other than that it was a perfect rainy day romantic movie.

I am so glad this movie is finally out on DVD.  I saw it when it first aired on CBS.  I have been waiting a long time for it to come out.  I loved Bruce Greenwood and Emma Sams in this movie.  It was pretty close to the book too.
